org.spongepowered.api.command

Interface CommandManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommandCallable, Dispatcher

    public interface CommandManager
extends Dispatcher
    A command dispatcher watches for commands (such as those said in chat) and dispatches them to the correct command handler.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        Optional<CommandMapping> register(Object plugin,
                                  CommandCallable callable,
                                  String... alias)
        Register a given command using the given list of aliases.

        If there is a conflict with one of the aliases (i.e. that alias is already assigned to another command), then the alias will be skipped. It is possible for there to be no alias to be available out of the provided list of aliases, which would mean that the command would not be assigned to any aliases.

        The first non-conflicted alias becomes the "primary alias."

        Parameters:
        plugin - A plugin instance
        callable - The command
        alias - An array of aliases
        Returns:
        The registered command mapping, unless no aliases could be registered
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if plugin is not a plugin instance

      • register

        Optional<CommandMapping> register(Object plugin,
                                  CommandCallable callable,
                                  List<String> aliases)
        Register a given command using the given list of aliases.

        If there is a conflict with one of the aliases (i.e. that alias is already assigned to another command), then the alias will be skipped. It is possible for there to be no alias to be available out of the provided list of aliases, which would mean that the command would not be assigned to any aliases.

        The first non-conflicted alias becomes the "primary alias."

        Parameters:
        plugin - A plugin instance
        callable - The command
        aliases - A list of aliases
        Returns:
        The registered command mapping, unless no aliases could be registered
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if plugin is not a plugin instance

      • register

        Optional<CommandMapping> register(Object plugin,
                                  CommandCallable callable,
                                  List<String> aliases,
                                  Function<List<String>,List<String>> callback)
        Register a given command using a given list of aliases.

        The provided callback function will be called with a list of aliases that are not taken (from the list of aliases that were requested) and it should return a list of aliases to actually register. Aliases may be removed, and if no aliases remain, then the command will not be registered. It may be possible that no aliases are available, and thus the callback would receive an empty list. New aliases should not be added to the list in the callback as this may cause IllegalArgumentException to be thrown.

        The first non-conflicted alias becomes the "primary alias."

        Parameters:
        plugin - A plugin instance
        callable - The command
        aliases - A list of aliases
        callback - The callback
        Returns:
        The registered command mapping, unless no aliases could be registered
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if new conflicting aliases are added in the callback
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if plugin is not a plugin instance

      • removeMapping

        Optional<CommandMapping> removeMapping(CommandMapping mapping)
        Remove a command identified by the given mapping.
        Parameters:
        mapping - The mapping
        Returns:
        The previous mapping associated with the alias, if one was found

      • process

        CommandResult process(CommandSource source,
                      String arguments)
        Execute the command based on input arguments.

        The implementing class must perform the necessary permission checks.

        Specified by:
        process in interface CommandCallable
        Parameters:
        source - The caller of the command
        arguments - The raw arguments for this command
        Returns:
        The result of a command being processed

      • getSuggestions

        List<String> getSuggestions(CommandSource source,
                            String arguments,
                            @Nullable
                            Location<World> targetPosition)
        Gets a list of suggestions based on input.

        If a suggestion is chosen by the user, it will replace the last word.

        Specified by:
        getSuggestions in interface CommandCallable
        Parameters:
        source - The command source
        arguments - The arguments entered up to this point
        targetPosition - The position the source is looking at when performing tab completion
        Returns:
        A list of suggestions
